sqlMap.insert: insert into post (id, categoryId, displayId, title, contents, dateCreated) values(#id#, #category.id#, #displayId#, #title#, #contents#, #dateCreated#)
sqlMap.update: update post set categoryId = #category.id#, title = #title#, contents = #contents# where id = #id#
